data.description: In Herobound: Spirit Champion, you play as the chosen avatar of the Spirit of Life.  Explore the 4 natural realms in your quest to free the other Spirits.  Each time you free one of the captive Spirits, you are granted a magical stone that imbues you with some of their power. Use their powers to face and ultimately defeat the Spirit of Fire. Unlock more of the world as you explore the world “room to room”, earning new powers and items to become the Spirit Champion.

changelog.change_log: Update to fix audio issue on S6
Fixed issue with Note 4 crash coming out of Player house.

Any saves left in a state where the Earth Boss could not be summoned should now be fixed.
Fixed save games restoring incorrectly when the player chooses to return to the main menu.  The current room will now be reset as intended on load.
Scene fades quickly on falling death. Player is now only disabled once the scene fades.
Adding missing collision in Earth Boss room
Fixed Player deaths not playing at the correct position.
Fixed weapon trail not showing after changing scenes.
Fixed various issues with Air Boss encounter
Fixed various issues with Turtle encounter.  
Fixed hit switch for large mover not resetting properly in water int 02
Fixed various pathing issues for creatures.  
Adding persistent parents to fix hit switches getting out of sync from gates.  
Fixed hit switch flares not working!
Removing persistence on switches and just adding a global fix.  All previous saves should be fixed and any future issues to should be resolved. 
Making this hero totes adorbs. (Player character will look at the player again)
Fixed player not respecting gravity when dying.
Adding sound effects to owl tornado
Fixed some input buttons not being setup for platform dependency properly.
Fixed looping sounds without any finish events shutting down immediately.

Fixed issue where player would fall through floor in Fire Dungeon.
Fixed issue where player when leaving Fire Boss room would fall through floor.
Fixed various issues in Water Zone
Fixed various sound issues throughout game. 
Fixed chat dialogs sometimes not saving properly. 
Fixed issue with Turtle Boss.
